task: Develop a basic 'The Elder Scrolls' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Decorate, decorate'.
name: Elder Scrolls: Ornate Realms

branding_data.short_description: Elder Scrolls: Ornate Realms invites players to explore a richly decorated world, filled with intricate designs and lavish environments that enhance the classic Elder Scrolls experience.
branding_data.detailed_description: Elder Scrolls: Ornate Realms takes the beloved open-world RPG elements of the Elder Scrolls series and infuses them with an emphasis on lavish aesthetics and intricate details. In this iteration, players traverse a world where every city, dungeon, and landscape is adorned with elaborate decorations, from opulent architecture to meticulously crafted flora and fauna. The game encourages exploration not only for quests and adventure but also to appreciate the beauty and artistry of the world. Players can engage in a variety of quests that highlight the cultural and artistic heritage of the different realms, while crafting and enchanting systems allow them to create their own ornate items and decorations. The game also features a dynamic weather and day-night cycle that brings the decorated environments to life, offering new visual experiences at different times and conditions.
